remarks: Lemma for ~ stoweid : a class variable replaces a setvar variable, for constant functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
stoweidlem4.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( t e. T |-> x ) e. A ) $.
stoweidlem4 $p |- ( ( ph /\ B e. RR ) -> ( t e. T |-> B ) e. A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B t x $.
$d T x $.
$d ph x $.
